Articles.Content: I don't know if this has been suggested before, but notifications should alert you when someone quotes your post in a reply, I shouldn't have to hunt through all the notifications in my profile to find the one where someone wants to say something?
Heh, sorry about that. This is not a feature that's supported by vBulletin and since people can edit quotes or even type them out entirely by hand I don't think this is feasible.
